headline: NRG Energy (NRG) Stock Drops Despite Market Gains: Important Facts to Note
summary: In the closing of the recent trading day, NRG Energy (NRG) stood at $161.59, denoting a -2.75% move from the preceding trading day.

headline: Venezuela Fuels Broad Sector Rally But These Oil And Gas Plays Slide
summary: Venezuela news hit the stock market Monday, boosting many oil stocks, but several slid as natural gas prices sank.

headline: AES Stock Rises 28.6% in 6 Months: What Should Investors Do?
summary: AES shares are up 28.6% in six months as renewables, data center PPAs and LNG projects drive growth, but high debt tempers upside.
